Description:
Model
Brand: Seagate
Series: BarraCuda
Model: ST2000LM015
Packaging: Bare Drive


Performance
Interface: SATA 6.0Gb/s
Capacity: 2TB
Cache: 128MB
RPM: 5400 RPM


Features
Features: Broadest 2.5-inch hard drive portfolio with up to 5TB capacity and both 7mm and 15mm form factors suitable for a variety of compute applications.

Thinnest and lightest 2.5-inch hard drive with up to 2TB storage in a 7mm z-height, providing seamless upgrades of thin and light laptops and smaller form factor systems.

Fast data rates of up to 140MB/s enables superior PC end-user experience and snappier file transfers.

2.5-inch, 15mm z-height hard drives provide 3TB to 5TB in capacity, offering the highest-capacity 2.5-inch hard drives available for external or all-in-one storage.

15mm z-height enables slimmer all-in-one desktop PC drives while helping reduce system heat generation and vibration. 

Low startup current configurations for 3TB to 5TB drives enable use in legacy low-current systems like USB-2 external boxes, while simultaneously lowering power consumption.

5TB drives can store more than 1.25 million songs and 600 hours of HD video.
Usage: For Daily Computing


Dimensions
Form Factor: 2.5"
Height (maximum): 7mm
Width (maximum): 69.85mm
Length (maximum): 100.35mm
Label: HDD 2.5 - Seagate Barracuda 2TB
